dcterms:creator: Wei Liu
Dragomir Anguelov
Dumitru Erhan
Christian Szegedy
Scott Reed
Cheng-Yang Fu
Alexander C Berg
dcterms:description: This dataset currently consists of 310 images of the human user’s face over 4 years to model the real world image space (unique lighting, angles, age). In consideration of image and model safety the author’s face is used in the dataset. After extracting the face subset using a Caffe-based face detector, each image is cropped to the same dimension.
dcterms:title: Human User Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kimmo Karkkainen
Jungseock Joo
dcterms:description: FairFace is a race balanced dataset consisting of 108,501 face images. Each image is treated as a unique user in the verification system. Like in the previous dataset, after extracting the face subset using a Caffe-based face detector, each image is cropped to the same dimension.
dcterms:title: FairFace
